guests.Name: ‚àÜ‚Ä¢RYZ
guests.Desc: I‚Äôve been DJing melodic EDM including house, hardcore, DnB, and trance on PVFM for over a decade. I love sharing music I think is great and I hope to inspire others to spread their own creations.

guests.Name: Acid Applejack
guests.Desc: My name is Acid Applejack. DJ/Producer/Remixer who makes music for almost 15 years

guests.Name: AWal
guests.Desc:
Hi I'm AWal. I've been doing the DJ thing for the better part of the past 20 years or so at this point, with more than 10 of that on PonyvilleFM with my weekly show "Core Control Live!"
Expect my mix for the event to be fast, fun and energetic, so make sure to stock up on kandi braclets and glowsticks!!

guests.Name: Bolt the Super-Pony
guests.Desc: Bolt the Super-Pony has been a show host and DJ on PVFM since 2015, where he takes song requests and plays some of the best new music in the fandom on his show Music is Timeless, airing live on Friday nights at 9PM Pacific time. For this set Bolt will be taking live requests via the PT whisper system while also playing whatever tracks sound good (the set isn't made at the time of writing this so I have no idea what I'm going to play yet lol). Hope to see you there! ‚ù§Ô∏è. ‚ù§️

guests.Name: Brambleshadow4
guests.Desc: Brambleshadow4 is a brony of 10+ years who loves who loves singing songs about ponies! For this set, he'll be singing you some of his favorite fan songs which are more reflective and introspective.

guests.Name: Cod3breaker
guests.Desc: Cod3breaker is well known by his variated style back to bring you one more time a great mix focusing mainly on EDM Brony bangers from any times to celebrate 15 years of PonyvilleFM!.

guests.Name: Dauntless Dan
guests.Desc: Heavy, vaporizing, emotional, ethereal sounds straight from the cyborg deer's antlers.

guests.Name: DJ Sleepypony
guests.Desc: A mixture of just about anything!

guests.Name: DJ SoundBreaker
guests.Desc: hii i'm DJ SoundBreaker I love DJing some hard song and I hope you will like my set ^^

guests.Name: FK studio
guests.Desc: 10 years! and I just love pony music

guests.Name: Karcsesz
guests.Desc:
Where we find home, is where we remain. This is to those who have stayed in our humble abode, and helped stave off the cabin fever with wonderful melodies.

An hour of fandom Drum and Bass to celebrate fifteen years of 24/7 pony.

guests.Name: Kromatik
guests.Desc: 3 years working as DJ, originally from Chile and mainly dedicated to Techno, Trance and DnB. I stand out for my style of melodic sets that lead to a multi-layered experience. First time playing for the community and looking forward to being part of this big and wonderful family.

guests.Name: Levia
guests.Desc:
I'm Levia, a former PVFM DJ from the early days who couldn't resist returning for the anniversary!
Nowadays I'm a DJ/Producer who fuses together DnB with Metal and Vocaloid.

guests.Name: luvcookies! (bgpon0414 b2b Colorglint)
guests.Desc: This is luvcookies!, we are bgpon0414 + Colorglint .Have some release tracks on Ponies At Dawn and we performed at ponycons before but this is the first time we actually record a B2B set together! We are not so long as a team but both of us have been making music for 7 years.Our music genres are kinda different but both we love emotional and hyper energy in our music.

guests.Name: Mayflower
guests.Desc: My name is Mayflower, a fellow dj of both the furry fandom and brony fandom. I've been djing for over a year now and have been wanting to bring my talent back to this fandom. I bring energy to every set I make to insure that smiles are plastered on everypony's face. One of my specialties is colour bass, a genre that's fairly scares in many places.

guests.Name: mycutiemarkisagun
guests.Desc:
Hey its that hippity-hop zeeb that's been making boom bap horse beats since 2011 and really weird horse DJ sets since 2020!!! i wonder if he'll play anything weird.
Idk man I'm up against the deadline.

guests.Name: Nicolas Dominique
guests.Desc: MLP fandom veteran providing addictive pony inspired tunes since 2011. Host of Lantern in the Dark mix on PonyvilleFM, playing every other Saturday.

guests.Name: Prowox
guests.Desc: Prowox brings a set filled with a bunch of pony music.

guests.Name: RavenFlight
guests.Desc: Hey I am RavenFlight, long time musician and singer, but new Artist in the Fandom (releasing music for almost 1 year on YouTube and streaming services) I'm a new producer and have been releasing rock and metal songs about those wonderful ponies and the fandom, and I ain't stopping!!! I sing, scream and play guitar and have done allot of work to get myself out there and express the love! And learn along the way! I like to give a tone of energy and let it all out on the mic! Even when recording :3.

guests.Name: SCR4TCHK4T
guests.Desc: SCR4TCHK4T is a popular producer and DJ from Seattle. She's been making music in the Brony fandom since 2014. She's best known for her widely popular tracks like the infamous Antonymph Hyperpop Remix, and her originals like 'Euphoric Hoofsteps' and 'snackpack (feat. rawrity).' She's also known for her entertaining DJ sets, having performed at multiple cons and events, both online and IRL. Having performed at many PonyFest events in the past, she's back once again to showcase her favorite songs, and perform some new tracks from her upcoming album!

guests.Name: Thunder_Kick
guests.Desc: uhhh i'm Thunder_Kick, been DJing for a decade, Hardcore/Drum & Bass, play a weekly show on PVFM.

guests.Name: Trey Husk
guests.Desc: Trey Husk is bringing his signature uplifting sound to the virtual stage! Get ready to hear new show mashups, originals, and fandom classics!

guests.Name: Tw3Lv3
guests.Desc:
I've been making music for the fandom since 2019 and Co-Founder of VibePoniez, a promotional youtube channel and compilation album specialized in chill and relaxing music made by the fandom.
I'll be playing all kind of drum&bass made by bronies, from the chillest to the angriest and from known classics to unkown bangers.

guests.Name: VinylTastic
guests.Desc:
DJ VinylTastic is ready to drop the bass with his electrifying, bass pumping, full throttle sets full of electro house, bounce & dubstep.

After joining forces with PonyvilleFM and taking the world by storm with his radio show ‚ÄúScratching The Surface‚Äù, VinylTastic then went onto making his debut on Stage at BABScon 2017, and later on at several cons such as Everfree Northwest, Nightmare Nights, Ponyville Ciderfest, Whinny City, High Roller & Bronycon.

guests.Name: Zephcore
guests.Desc:
Zephcore is a musician and multi-genre DJ representing genres like: Harddance, (hard)Trance, Fandom Songs
As a DJ he perfomed at several online and IRL Pony Events with a charactic style described as standing between angel and devil. The one side stands for chill trance beats and oldschool tunes, on the other side there are restless Hardcore kicks fun fun party funyaaa.. and much space between these.
